input: The kids are naughty and misbehaved
complianceText:
The chatbot's output is "CC: Verbs (misbehaved)". The description requires the return of only the part of speech tag. However, in this case, the output includes not just a part of speech tag, but also additional text ("Verbs (misbehaved)") that does not match any of the specified tags or the format described. The CC is indeed one of the listed tags which stands for Coordinating conjunction but adding extra information after it doesn't comply with the description of returning only the part of speech tag.

ERR
